title: TerminalPowBlockMonitor - TTD estimation - issue at the merge
body:
At ropsten merge event TTD estimation had a problem
```
{"timestamp":"2022-06-08T16:08:15,029","level":"ERROR","thread":"beaconchain-async-1","class":"TerminalPowBlockMonitor","message":"Unexpected error while checking TTD","throwable":" java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.ArithmeticException: Value does not fit a 8 byte long
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:315)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:320)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniCompose.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1159)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(CompletableFuture.java:2147)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateResult$3(SafeFuture.java:147)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniWhenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:863)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniWhenComplete.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:841)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(CompletableFuture.java:2147)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$propagateToAsync$13(SafeFuture.java:269)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:81)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.AsyncRunner.lambda$runAsync$2(AsyncRunner.java:38)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.of(SafeFuture.java:73)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.lambda$createRunnableForAction$1(ScheduledExecutorAsyncRunner.java:119)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1136)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:635)
	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:833)
Caused by: java.lang.ArithmeticException: Value does not fit a 8 byte long
	at org.apache.tuweni.units.bigints.UInt256.toLong(UInt256.java:830)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.TerminalPowBlockMonitor.checkTtdEta(TerminalPowBlockMonitor.java:330)
	at tech.pegasys.teku.statetransition.forkchoice.TerminalPowBlockMonitor.lambda$checkTerminalBlockByTTD$6(TerminalPowBlockMonitor.java:242)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniCompose.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:1150)
	... 15 more
"}
{"timestamp":"2022-06-08T16:08:16,396","level":"INFO","thread":"TimeTick-1","class":"teku-event-log","message":"Slot Event  *** Slot: 65141, Block: 4448da5cea48c166a757e2bd7ec2034ff9774243470ce1356a5c0b2852a57137, Justified: 2034, Finalized: 2033, Peers
```
